com.cmput301w20t10.uberapp.database.dao

Class LoginRegisterDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w20t10.uberapp.database.dao.LoginRegisterDAO

  • public class LoginRegisterDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object (DAO) for all login and registration related functions. DAO contains specific operations that are concerned with the model they are associated with.

    • Method Detail

      • logInAsRider

        public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<Rider> logInAsRider(java.lang.String username,
                                                              java.lang.String password,
                                                              androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner owner)
        Logs the user in as a rider and checks if the given credentials are valid.

        Sample code: 

              DatabaseManager db = DatabaseManager.getInstance();
      LoginRegisterDAO dao = db.getLoginRegisterDAO();
      MutableLiveData rider = dao.logInAsRider(...);
      rider.observe(this, rider -> {...});
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        owner -
        Returns:
        Returns a MutableLiveData object which should be observed.
        • If the credentials are valid, the observer receives a Rider object
        • Otherwise, the observer receives null

      • registerRider

        public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<Rider> registerRider(java.lang.String username,
                                                               java.lang.String password,
                                                               java.lang.String email,
                                                               java.lang.String firstName,
                                                               java.lang.String lastName,
                                                               java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                                                               java.lang.String image,
                                                               androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner owner)
        Registers the user as a rider.

        Sample code: 

              // for consistency with other methods
      DatabaseManager db = DatabaseManager.getInstance();
      LoginRegisterDAO dao = db.getLoginRegisterDAO();
      MutableLiveData rider = dao.RegisterRider(...);
      rider.observe(this, rider -> {...});
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        email -
        firstName -
        lastName -
        phoneNumber -
        owner -
